framework.name: DDev

command.name: help
command.help:
help

Usage:
help

Displays help for flow or about a given command identifier

command.name: auth-pantheon
command.help:
auth-pantheon

Provide a machine token for the global pantheon auth.

command.name: config
command.help:
config

Create or modify a ddev project configuration in the current directory

command.name: describe
command.help:
describe

Get a detailed description of a running ddev project.

command.name: exec
command.help:
exec

Execute a shell command in the container for a service. Uses the web service by default.

command.name: import-db
command.help:
import-db

Import the database of an existing project to the dev environment.

command.name: import-files
command.help:
import-files

Import the uploaded files directory of an existing project to the default public upload directory of your project.

command.name: logs
command.help:
logs

Get the logs from your running services

command.name: pull
command.help:
pull

Import files and database using a configured provider plugin.

command.name: remove
command.help:
remove

Remove the development environment for a project.

command.name: restart
command.help:
restart

Restart the development environment for a project.

command.name: ssh
command.help:
ssh

Starts a shell session in the container for a service. Uses web service by default.

command.name: stop
command.help:
stop

Stop the development environment for a project.

framework.help:
Usage:
flow

See "flow help" for a list of all available commands.
